channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13904] Ignore case when retrieving ColumnInfo from RowResolver
item.description:
To reproduce:

-- upper case in subq
explain
select * from src b
where exists
  (select a.key from src a
  where b.VALUE = a.VALUE
  );
item.summary: Ignore case when retrieving ColumnInfo from RowResolver

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
